the east.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the eastern part of a country or area
the east.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the countries in Asia, especially China and Japan
the east.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Martial arts originated in the East.
the east.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the countries in the eastern part of Europe and Central Asia
the east.translation[1].definitions[2].d: the part of the US east of the Mississippi River, especially the states north of Washington DC
